thread.title: CNN mistakes LaMarcus Aldridge for Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: CNN mistakes LaMarcus Aldridge for Lamar Odom

title: CNN mistakes LaMarcus Aldridge for Lamar Odom
text:
CNN mistakes LaMarcus Aldridge for Lamar Odom On-air photo mixes up players Published 8:13 AM CDT Oct 16, 2015 Photos Steve Dykes/Getty Images 
A photo displayed during some of CNN's live coverage of Lamar Odom's hospitalization wasn't Odom, but San Antonio Spurs forward LaMarcus Aldridge, according to a US Weekly report. More 
Twitter was soon alight with users pointing out the error. 
NFL nose tackle Terrance Knighton tweeted "Not a good look CNN.... Definitely Lamarcus Aldridge," along with a screengrab of the mistake. 
Others were asking how the mistake could have happened. 
Odom, the former NBA basketball and reality TV star, is fighting for his life at a Nevada hospital after being found unconscious at a brothel. 
Aldridge, known as an elite NBA player, scored 17 points and had 8 rebounds in his most recent preseason game with the Spurs on Oct. 12. Not a good look CNN.... Definitely Lamarcus Aldridge pic.twitter.com/GFFDFBXLN5
